case_title: BARKAT vs Haji GHULAM MUHAMMAD AND ANOTHER
judges: Shamim Hussain Qadri, A. R. Sheikh

key_points.second_writ_petition: Allowed by learned Judge in Chambers
key_points.dismissal_of_second_writ_petition: Based on suppression of material facts and res judicata
